subject: CNN.com Daily Top 10
body:
CNN.com Daily Top 10


































Imus: 'I've apologized enough'
Shock jock Don Imus on his radio show Thursday said "I've apologized enough" and will not go on "some talk show tour."





2. Ohio man accused of al Qaeda ties





3. 'Idol' sends another packing





4. Justice panel to vote on subpoenas





5. 'Ugly's' Ferrera: I like who I am





6. Winkler murder trial begins





7. Woman guilty of cutting up rival





8. Blast hits parliament cafeteria





9. Show plays pregnancy for laughs





10. Friend: Victim tried to flee abuse




 
















When is a joke not a joke?
CNN's Jeanne Moos asks, "Have you heard the one about the president and the hybrid vehicle?" (April 11)





2. Toddler finally leaves hospital
